a female worker who is in charge of a group of other workers, especially in a factory
a woman who is the leader of a jury and announces their decision in court
a woman who is in charge of a group of workers, for example in a factory
the forewoman at a watch factory
a woman who is the leader of a JURY (=the group of ordinary people who decide whether someone is guilty in some courts of law)
The defendant stared expressionlessly as the forewoman of the six-man, six-woman jury announced the guilty verdict.
